cards.flavorText: Experiments intended to create the perfect holiday emissary resulted in a substance harder than darksteel and a fraction as merry.
cards.name: Fruitcake Elemental
cards.text:
Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible.
At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you.
{3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.

cards.name: Gifts Given
cards.text: Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles their library.

cards.flavorText: 'Tis better to give than to receive.
cards.name: Evil Presents
cards.text: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.

cards.flavorText: Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the bloodsoaked battlefields behind him.
cards.name: Season's Beatings
cards.text: Family gathering - Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.

cards.flavorText: WARNING: Shake gently. Contents may cause choking, hypothermia, and/or planar invasion.
cards.name: Snow Mercy
cards.text:
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it.
{T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.

cards.flavorText: It loves having family for dinner.
cards.name: Yule Ooze
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy another nonland permanent chosen at random, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on Yule Ooze equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.
{R}{G}, Eat some food: Regenerate Yule Ooze.

cards.name: Nice
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put it into another target player's hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Naughty
cards.text: Search another target player's library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle that player's library.

cards.flavorText: Just hope yours isn't full of coal golems.
cards.name: Stocking Tiger
cards.text:
Stocking Tiger enters the battlefield with a sealed Magic booster pack under it.
When Stocking Tiger deals combat damage to a player, unwrap the booster pack and put it into your hand.

cards.flavorText: Even though Urza tried to apologize, Mishra continued to bear a grudge.
cards.name: Mishra's Toy Workshop
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only on spells and abilities that put tokens onto the battlefield. Use toys to represent the tokens.

cards.flavorText: "What fun it is to ride and sing a slaying song tonight!"
cards.name: Goblin Sleigh Ride
cards.text: Target creature you control climbs into Goblin Sleigh Ride. You slide them on their merry way. If the creature stayed on, it deals damage equal to its toughness to each other creature touched during the slide.

cards.flavorText: They all thought her dream was just pie in the sky.
cards.name: Thopter Pie Network
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're eating, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Use food to represent the token.
Whenever a creature token you control dies, if it's represented by food, eat it.

cards.flavorText: Now all they needed was a jolly, happy soul.
cards.name: Some Disassembly Required
cards.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Distribute the sacrifices creature's keyword abilities among any number of other target creatures until end of turn. If it's December, you gain 1 life for each of those keywords.

cards.name: Bog Humbugs
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Bog Humbugs deals combat damage, hum that many notes of a festive song. If you can, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Humbugs.
